pullrequest.title: Added camera intrinsics (fx, fy, cx, cy, s).

content.raw:
Indeed I am using `UpdateCameraIntrinsics`in a plugin for dynamically updating the parameters from a CameraInfo msg:  
[https://github.com/carlosmccosta/gazebo\_ros\_pkgs/blob/melodic-devel-gz10/gazebo\_plugins/src/gazebo\_ros\_camera\_utils.cpp#L437](https://github.com/carlosmccosta/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/melodic-devel-gz10/gazebo_plugins/src/gazebo_ros_camera_utils.cpp#L437)

But I can change `LoadCameraIntrinsics` to private if needed.
content.html:
Indeed I am using UpdateCameraIntrinsicsin a plugin for dynamically updating the parameters from a CameraInfo msg:
https://github.com/carlosmccosta/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/melodic-devel-gz10/gazebo_plugins/src/gazebo_ros_camera_utils.cpp#L437

But I can change LoadCameraIntrinsics to private if needed.
